charinfo.name: Edo Tensei Toroi (S)
charinfo.description: Edo Tensei Toroi (S) is back on the battlefield wreaking havoc as he goes. It will be a difficult situation for whoever may come across him.

abilities.name: Magnetic Field
abilities.description: Edo Tensei Toroi (S) uses Magnetic Field on one enemy dealing 20 damage. If an enemy uses a skill on Edo Tensei Toroi (S) the following 2 turns they will ignore healing effects permanently. Magnetized Shuriken and Magnetic Current will deal an additional 5 damage to the target of this skill permanently. This effect stacks.

abilities.name: Shurikenjutsu
abilities.description: Using Shurikenjutsu Edo Tensei Toroi (S) gains 50% damage reduction for 3 turns. This skill becomes Magnetized Shuriken for 3 turns when used.

abilities.name: Magnetic Current
abilities.description: Edo Tensei Toroi (S) uses Magnetic Current on all enemies dealing 10 piercing damage. Magnetic Field and Magnetized Shuriken will deal an additional 5 damage to a target of this skill permanently. This effect stacks.

abilities.name: Shuriken Threads
abilities.description: This skill makes Edo Tensei Toroi (S) invulnerable for 1 turn.
